description: io: prevent Copyn from unnecessarily returning os.EOF

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

I think we may want to make a more expansive change to keep the
behaviour consistent across Read/ReadAt/Copy/Copyn.
Can we discuss it a separate thread first?


Dave.

subject: code review 4630060: io: prevent Copyn from unnecessarily returning os.EOF
